alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Johnson; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 11:08PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Johnson, southeastern Benton, southwestern Linn and Iowa Counties through 1130 PM CST... At 1107 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Millersburg, or 14 miles east of Montezuma, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Millersburg around 1110 PM CST. Ladora around 1115 PM CST. Marengo, Williamsburg and Conroy around 1120 PM CST. Oxford and Amana around 1125 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Coralville, North Liberty, Tiffin, Swisher and Shueyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 240. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
